availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Charles H. Tomlinson (Scott County, Kentucky, farmer, laborer, and prisoner)

body.p: Scott County, Kentucky, farmer, laborer, and prisoner. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah "Sally" Ann Estes Tomlinson in Scott County on February 17, 1853. Father of Thomas Tomlinson and Elizabeth Tomlinson. Farmer in Scott County in 1850. Laborer in Scott County. Prisoner in Kentucky State Penitentiary on a charge of manslaughter in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Scott County, District 2, 469B.
